description.narrative: (i) Demica will enhance access to finance for SME suppliers and distributors, by expanding the reach of its innovative and scalable trade and supply chain finance products in emerging markets. (ii) Demica will offer improved quality and terms of financing for SMEs compared to other forms of finance available. For example, through Demica's supply chain finance platform, SME suppliers can receive financing at terms based on the higher credit ratings of their large corporate buyers, obtaining lower rates than those offered by commercial banks to SMEs based on their own credit profiles.
